thread.title: Deutsche Bank's Amrolia switches to market making firm
thread.title_full: Deutsche Bank's Amrolia switches to market making firm

author: Financial News
title: Deutsche Bank's Amrolia switches to market making firm
text:
Deutsche Bank's Amrolia switches to market making firm By Follow @_TimCave 02 September 2015 Deutsche Bank trading veteran Zar Amrolia is to join the emerging electronic market making firm XTX Markets, a move underlining the rise of non-bank firms in asset classes once dominated by big broker dealers.
